treatment-md.title: Rochinia Ng & Forges, 2013, s. str.
treatment-md.article-title: Samadinia longispina, a new genus and species of deep-sea spider crab from the western Pacific, and a new species of Rochinia A. Milne-Edwards, 1875, from Papua New Guinea (Crustacea: Brachyura: Majoidea: Epialtidae)
